name: How to make tables in Figma 2020 (thanks to Autolayout 3.0)
description:
Accompanying Medium article:

How to make tables in Figma 2020 — finally well (Autolayout 3.0 update) | by Klára Scholleová | Etnetera Activate | Dec, 2020 | Medium


A tutorial how to harvest new Autolayout 3.0 to make tables that are easily maintainable both by rows and columns.


You'll learn how to make a table that

  • has easily reordable, addable and switchable both rows and columns
  • has resizable both rows and columns
  • has cell content alignment just like in real Excel
  • is flexible for any sort of styling and cell variants
  • is resizable as a whole,

some of which was nearly impossible until Autolayout 3.0 was released.


Duplicate the file and get your hands on!


Hope this helps! Will appreciate any feedback at klara.scholleova@etnetera.cz or on Twitter @the_schollka - and get in touch in case you'd like to know more or if I should make Part 2 on the more advanced stuff!
